section.title: PortGroup java
section.para: PortGroup java is useful for Java packages.

section.title: java PortGroup Specific Keywords
section.para: Portfiles using the java PortGroup allow for port authors to set the following keywords in addition to the general Portfile keywords.

listitem.para: This keyword indicates that the port requires a Java installation of the specified version. If no such installation can be located, the port will fail at the pre-fetch phase.
The version string can indicate a specific version or a range with wildcards "+" and "*". Note that Java 8 and earlier are "1.8", etc., while Java 9 and later are "9", etc.
This keyword indicates an (optional) port dependency that will be added to the ports 'depends-lib' list in the case a prior installation of java satisfying the requested version can not be found.
